thread.title: Kim Kardashian enjoys lunch with Kanye and the kids after photos from Paris robbery ordeal emerge
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian enjoys lunch with Kanye and the kids after photos from Paris robbery ordeal emerge

author: Natalie Evans
title: Kim Kardashian enjoys lunch with Kanye and the kids after photos from Paris robbery ordeal emerge
text:
Kim Kardashian enjoys lunch with Kanye and the kids after photos from Paris robbery ordeal emerge The reality star kept a low profile for outing in LA as investigation into Paris robbery continues Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Inside the Kim Kardashian heist hotel crime scene Share this video Get   
Kim Kardashian enjoyed a family day out with husband Kanye West and their two children after shocking pictures from the scene of her Paris robbery ordeal emerged. 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 36, was pictured out for lunch at Something’s Fishy restaurant in Woodland Hills, California, alongside sister Kourtney and her children. 
Kim was dressed down in black jogging bottoms and an oversized black coat, teamed with trainers and sunglasses. 
She carried son Saint, one, while daughter North, three, walked alongside them, hand in hand with her cousin Penelope, four, the daughter of Kourtney and ex-boyfriend Scott Disick. Kim was pictured at lunch with her family in LA (Photo: FameFlynet) Husband Kanye and sister Kourtney also joined in the outing on February 19 (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Kanye, meanwhile, also went casual in jogging bottoms and a grey hoodie, as he followed his wife and children to the waiting car. 
Their outing came after photos were released showing the scene of Kim’s terrifying Parisian robbery ordeal in October 2016. 
Kim was left physically unharmed but shaken when masked men forced their way into her rented accommodation, while she was in bed. Kim carried Saint and held North's hand (Photo: FameFlynet) The family kept it low key for their day out (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The gang bound and gagged the 36-year-old mother-of-two before making off with £8.5m worth of jewellery. 
Unseen footage inside the suite at Hôtel de Pourtalès has been broadcast on French TV, showing gaffer tape used to gag the star and cable ties which were used to bind her hands. Four hooded men are seen entering the building (Photo: TF1) One of the suspects believed to be behind the raid (Photo: TF1) The man was caught on surveillance tape (Photo: TF1) 
Video was also shown of the robbers sitting outside the A Mon Café, three miles from the hotel where the attack took place on October 3 last year. 
Four men have been formally charged over the robbery, in which Kim's 20 Carat, £3.5million engagement ring was stolen. 
One – identified only as Yunice A, 63 – is said to have been one of the five hooded assailants. Gaffer tape was used to gag the star (Photo: TF1) Cable ties were also used to bind Kim's hands (Photo: TF1) A getaway car is identified (Photo: Daily Mirror) 
Yunice A. is a well known ‘career criminal’ with previous convictions for aggravated theft and for drug trafficking, according to judicial sources. 
He now faces another trial for armed robbery in an organised gang, and kidnapping as a member of the same group. 
The heist is said to have involved a network of other criminals, and three of them account for the other defendants charged. 
One is Gary Madar, the 27-year-old brother of Ms Kardashian’s 40-year-old limousine driver, Michael Madar, who has been released without charge. 
Gary Madar and an accomplice called Florus H., 44, are said to have informed the robbers of Ms Kardashian’s schedule while she was in the French capital for Paris Fashion Week. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
